Question Number 9:

write the query function

const items = [ { id: 1, name: 'foo', price: 2 }, { id: 3, name: 'bar', price: 4 }, { id: 66, name: 'bazz', price: 4 } ];


console.log(query(items, { name: 'foo'})); //prints foo object
console.log(query(items, { price: 4 })); //prints barr and bazz
console.log(query(items, { price: 4, name: 'bazz' })); //prints bazz

please export you function at the end: module.exports = yourFunction
